scripts.start:local: make start-db && env-cmd -f .env.local nodemon -r esm index.js
scripts.migrate:latest: make start-db && env-cmd -f .env.local npx knex migrate:latest
scripts.migrate:up: make start-db && env-cmd -f .env.local npx knex migrate:up
scripts.migrate:down: make start-db && env-cmd -f .env.local npx knex migrate:down
scripts.seed: make start-db && env-cmd -f .env.local npx knex seed:run
